Name: Dark Lord: Peacemaker
About the game: A dark fantasy classic RPG. Customize your race, gender and class. Gather a party with your favorite companions. Change the fate of the characters and the world with your choices. Gameplay Create a character. Customize your race, sex, name, class and non-combat skill. Create a unique protagonist. Who do you want to venture with? A human cleric, a dark elf ranger, or an orc defender? Gather a party that's the best for you! Choices affect the plot. How you interact with people in neighboring country depends on you, but beware - you may start a war. Turn-based combat with a focus on teamwork. Beware classes have their own strengths and weaknesses. Complement each other to win. Main Characters Dark Lord The dark-one monarch who has lived for five hundred years. She is determined to end the perennial struggle between dark ones and humans. Hero A descendant of the legendary hero. It is a calling for him to expel dark ones. Philia the Human Cleric A cleric of the border sanctuary. She has a dream that one day everyone in the world can be equal. Venom the Dark Elf Ranger A dark elf who specializes in swordplay and archery. His close friend was killed by the Hero. Coyote the Orc Defender A boy warrior from a tribe. He longed for the acceptance of humans and dark elves. Sanguine the Reanimator A master of alchemy and necromancy. She is unscrupulous for her goals. Bambooblade the Eastern Warrior The protagonist of MaouCat Studio's Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess. He comes from the Silver Kingdom in the Southeast.
Developers: Sounding Stone / 老奉毊,MaouCat Studio / 魔王貓工作室
